item.title: 200 CBD Serenity Hemp & Huny Lotion Vanilla and Honey
item.description: Huny-B’s 200 mg Hemp and Huny Lotion is enriched with CBD derived from the Hemp Plant and 100% Pure Hemp Seed Oil and blended with natural extracts to provide dramatic skin hydration and nourishment to help improve the health and condition of skin. Hemp Seed Oil is one of nature’s richest sources of Essential Fatty Acids and Key Amino Acids containing natural proteins, vitamins, antioxidants, and minerals, vital for healthy skin conditioning.
